plot: Bugs Bunny relates his early life in the Manhattan tenements and spotlights his encounter with a gang of canine toughs.
title: A Hare Grows in Manhattan
plot_es: Bugs Bunny relates his early life in the Manhattan tenements and spotlights his encounter with a gang of canine toughs.
plot_en: Bugs Bunny relates his early life in the Manhattan tenements and spotlights his encounter with a gang of canine toughs.
